thread.section_title: Millwood Inn & Suites - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Millbrae, CA) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Millwood Comfort
thread.title_full: Millwood Comfort - Review of Millwood Inn & Suites, Millbrae, CA - TripAdvisor

author: MRA1214
title: Millwood Comfort
text: You will have an excellent stay at a reasonable price. This is the nicest motel property I have ever stayed at. I love that the doors to the rooms are protected by an outer locked corridor that can only be accessed by your room key. The rooms are comfortable, clean and have great amenities. Complimentary breakfast was wonderful and the front desk clerk was so nice and attentive. Free shuttle to SFO airport only about a mile away. I would highly recommend this place!
